trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Kohl Ahleh fears for the welfare of a friend.
TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the pale dragon.
TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_TODO_01<tab>/pet the pale dragon.
TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_TODO_02<tab>Report to Kohl Ahleh.

TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_KOHLAHLEH_100_000<tab>Little wanderer... Hast thou the courage to ken what awaits beyond this oasis? My kin, twisted body and soul, or turned to ash...all long since rotted underneath...

TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_KOHLAHLEH_100_001<tab>Wilt thou venture amidst these horrors, to see if our brother yet stands? Ne'er hath he moved from his place of mourning, ere his consort was thus entombed...

TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_KOHLAHLEH_100_002<tab>Would that I could bring him the solace of a gentle touch, but I dare not seek him now. Shouldst thou wish it, thou shalt know him by the pallor of the forsaken...

TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_KOHLAHLEH_100_003<tab>I prithee journey past the fissures, beyond even Ahm Nohl, and seek my closest of kin... His wounds are many, but by a gentle touch they may be soothed for a time.

TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>The dragon, like so many others, is mired in his own grief. You may draw his attention if you <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>pet<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him gently as Kohl Ahleh suggested.
TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_DRAGONB04338_000_010<tab>Thy gentle caress, like unto the warmth of more joyous times...
TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_DRAGONB04338_000_011<tab>Thou art not of my kind. Why hast thou come?
TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_DRAGONB04338_000_012<tab>So he has not yet forgotten me... I pity him.
TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_DRAGONB04338_000_013<tab>At times I wonder if my love doth pity me in turn. All of us unchanging, unable to be reborn...
TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_DRAGONB04338_000_014<tab>Yet if naught else remains of us...we have memory. Thus do I remain beside my beloved, through a thousand thousand quiet moments. Forever...
TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_Q1_000_015<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_A1_000_001<tab>There is a better way to honor your love. Weave a song.
TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_A1_000_002<tab>I know a dragon who once believed herself forsaken...
TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_DRAGONB04338_000_016<tab>Thou believest I need not languish in silence? Hmph...
TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_DRAGONB04338_000_017<tab>Perhaps thou art correct. My beloved was generous, noble, and took much joy in our skies... None is more deserving of a proud melody.
TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_DRAGONB04338_000_018<tab>I have not the strength to weave it in this moment...but perhaps in time. I thank thee for guiding me aright.
TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_DRAGONB04338_000_019<tab>Pray tell Kohl Ahleh we will meet again...
TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_KOHLAHLEH_100_025<tab>How fareth my kin?

TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_KOHLAHLEH_100_026<tab>I see... Thou art wiser than thou knowest, for our brother was once renowned for his verse. It would be an honor and a joy to hear his voice raised in song again.
TEXT_AKTKZJ002_04338_KOHLAHLEH_100_027<tab>Perhaps, when next you return, thou shalt hear it as well.
